metadata.title: CVE-2024-42156 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/pkey: Wipe copies of clear-key structures on failureWipe all sensitive data from stack for all IOCTLs, which convert aclear-key into a protected- or secure-key.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
